title: Should any of the Champions become a parent?
body:
Ashe seems like the most likely given that she's one of the few who we know is married. But would it work if she were to have a child in some future development(s)?

Or is the idea of a Champion with kids a major turnoff for Riot's writers?

_INB4 "Pregnant X" skin ideas._

replies.body: {{champion:421}} is the mother of a whole race, it counts, right?

i mean... Urgot and yorick(pre-rework) made fiora right? XDDDD

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
No wonder FIora is a such an ungodly abomination.
